description: Indicates that data has been ingested into a root dataset.

inputCheckpoint.description: Hash of the checkpoint file used to restore ingestion state, if any.

outputData.description: Describes output data written during this transaction, if any.

outputCheckpoint.description: Describes checkpoint written during this transaction, if any.

outputWatermark.description: Last watermark of the output data stream, if changed.

sourceState.description: The state of the source the data was added from to allow fast resuming.
